overview:
Consumer Internet technology and digital media expert, with a primary focus on social commerce, online entertainment, and new technologies.

Laurence is an expert in building companies, raising capital and delivering innovation with appreciation for injecting an infectious spirit in his job and the people he works with.

Laurence Nathanson is currently President / Founder of Innovate Consulting, a consulting company he runs to help clients on short or long-term business development projects. He specializes in strategic partnerships and marketing concepts, a strength that has previously brought in over $20 million in deal flow through business development, marketing and licensing in the US, Asia and Europe. He has been on the executive team of seven web start-ups and has an international career that expands over 20 years with more than 16 years in the web industry.

Laurence holds a B.S. in Business Administration from Boston University.

milestones.description: Joined Pure Verticals as Co-Founder and SVP/Business Development
